All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BadDateFormatException
A RuntimeException thrown in cases of a bad date format provided by the user.
BasicCountryEntry
A simple POJO to answer task 1(a) of the instructions.
BasicCountryEntryAssembler
A RepresentationModelAssembler that formats BasicCountryEntry entities for presenting a link to relevant methods of NationsRestController.
ComponentLogger
AOP-enabled class that logs all calls to public methods of repositories annotated with Logged.
Constants
Various constants used by our application.
CountryAndLanguageEntry
A simple POJO to answer task 1(b) of the instructions.
CountryNotFoundException
Î‘ RuntimeException thrown by our application when a query based on a provided country could not find any associated data.
DataAccessLayerException
A RuntimeException thrown by our persistence layer in case of unrecoverable database errors.
DBConnection
An interface that defines the operations that we want from the persistence layer of our application.
DBConnectionImpl
 
EmailAlreadyInDatabaseException
A RuntimeException thrown when the user tries to register with a username that already exists in the database.
ExceptionAdvice
RestControllerAdvice for all our custom exceptions, and some non-custom ones, too.
ExceptionMessageContainer
A simple message container to allow exception handlers to be rendered by clients in JSON format.
InvalidSortByFieldException
A RuntimeException thrown in paginated queries when the user provides an invalid field to sort by.
JwtAuthenticationController
Controller for user authentication.
JwtAuthenticationEntryPoint
Defines the default API response for unauthenticated calls to any endpoint.
JwtAuthenticationService
A service class that provides a single authentication method for users.
JwtRequest
Simple POJO for defining a user request for a JWT token.
JwtRequestFilter
A OncePerRequestFilter that filters every incoming request to make sure that it is properly authenticated with an unexpired JWT token.
JwtResponse
Simple POJO that defines the API's response to the user for a JWT token request.
JwtTokenUtil
Various utilities for generating and parsing JWTs.
JwtUserDetailsService
Service class that talks to the database to retrieve and store user information.
LanguagesAssembler
A RepresentationModelAssembler that formats CountryAndLanguageEntry entities for presenting a link to relevant methods of NationsRestController.
Loc
Simple enum used by MethodLoggingMessages to log entrance or exit from methods.
Logged
An empty interface that we decorate classes for which we want to log the entrance and exit (gracious or otherwise) to its methods.
MaxGDPPerCapitaEntry
A simple POJO to answer task 2 of the instructions.
MaxGDPPerCapitaEntryAssembler
A RepresentationModelAssembler that formats MaxGDPPerCapitaEntry entities for presenting a link to relevant methods of NationsRestController.
MethodLoggingMessages
final class whose static methods are used by ComponentLogger classes to log their messages.
NationsApplication
 
NationsRestController
RestController that exposes endpoints that enable the functionality required by the assignment's tasks.
NationsRestService
Service-level class that connects the controller level to the persistence store.
OpenAPI30Configuration
A configuration class that configures the OpenAPI 3 components for our app.
PaginatedQueryParams
A container for parameters used in pagination / sorting / filter aggregate GET queries.
PasswordEncoderConfig
Defines a Spring Bean of type PasswordEncoder for the various components to use.
SecurityConfig
Spring Security configuration for API.
SortOrder
A simple enum used by various methods that want to designate ascending or descending sorting order.
StatsEntry
A simple POJO to answer task 3 of the instructions.
StatsEntryAssembler
A RepresentationModelAssembler that formats StatsEntry entities for presenting a link to relevant methods of NationsRestController.
TimeZoneConfig
Configuring the default timezone used by the Spring app.
UserDto
DTO class for Users.
UserEntity
Database object for application users.
UserRepository
A JpaRepository used to persist UserEntity instances.
